Contact Us
3
Many Ways to Communicate
If you have any questions about Florida’s most award-winning community, we are here for you! You can reach out to us at the Miromar Lakes Sales Gallery, the Miromar Lakes Beach Club, the Miromar Lakes Golf Club, the Miromar Lakes Masters Association, Inc. and for Media Inquiries as well. Please contact us at the phone numbers below.
MIROMAR LAKES SALES GALLERY
10160 Miromar Lakes Blvd.
Miromar Lakes, FL 33913
(239) 425-2340
Toll-free:
(877) 809-9444
MIROMAR LAKES BEACH CLUB
18061 Miromar Lakes Pkwy.
Miromar Lakes, FL 33913
(239) 415-7376
MIROMAR LAKES GOLF CLUB
18520 Miromar Lakes Blvd.
Miromar Lakes, FL 33913
(239) 482-7644
MIROMAR LAKES MASTER ASSOCIATION, INC.
Estoppel Requests:
[email protected]
MEDIA INQUIRIES
[email protected]
(239) 390-5100
Plan Your
Discovery Visit
We invite you to visit Miromar Lakes Beach & Golf Club. Let a member of our Sales Team take you on an extraordinary Boat & Land Tour. Our five-star amenities include a 700-acre contiguous aquamarine freshwater lake, 3 miles of private, white-sand beach, a 10,000-square-foot, zero-edge infinity pool; endless opportunities for boating, water skiing, kayaking, paddleboarding, fishing, two marinas, racquetball, pickleball, bocce, the European Wellness Spa and full-service salon; the state-of-the-art Fitness Center, Botanical Park, Concierge Services, Signature Championship Golf, three restaurants, plus a dynamic year-round social scene all within one luxurious location.
Request a Tour
Speak with an agent
Contact Us
3

Sales Team
3
Luxury Real Estate Sales Team
We are the experts at Miromar Realty! We just don’t sell real estate, we change the destiny of peoples lives in a positive way. The Miromar Lakes Sales Gallery is open 7 days a week and we never will miss a showing opportunity. Our location provides easy, one-stop, care-free shopping for home buyers and residents, and we produce more Miromar Lakes sales than any other real estate firm. Our Team also has incomparable knowledge of our award-winning amenities, Master Association and neighborhood rules, regulations and fees.
Kathy Jo Brooks
Director of Sales and Broker
Robert Ekdahl
Broker Associate
Meghan Evans
Sales Associate
MAKE AN INQUIRY TODAY
Kathy Jo Brooks
Director of Sales and Broker
With an unparalleled dedication to fostering relationships, Kathy leverages three decades of experience in the Real Estate Industry to lead with expertise as the Director of Sales at Miromar Lakes Beach & Golf Club. Her extensive background positions her as a seasoned leader, adept at navigating the complexities of the real estate market.
At the core of Kathy’s approach lies a commitment to communication, dedication, trust, and transparency. These values serve as the foundation upon which she builds successful relationships. As the Director of Sales and Broker of Miromar Realty, Kathy brings a wealth of knowledge in developing luxury communities, enriching the offerings of Miromar Lakes.
Kathy’s passion lies in assisting clients in charting a course toward the lifestyle they aspire to lead. She thrives on problem-solving, adeptly selling ideas, and crafting strategies for success. With a profound understanding of the nuances of the new construction market, Kathy is poised to guide clients towards the lifestyle they desire with finesse and precision.
Contact Kathy Jo Brooks at 239-908-2315 or
[email protected]
“There’s something about going through the entrance at Miromar Lakes. Seeing that fountain and driving through the gate and seeing the lake, it just relaxes us. The landscaping, it’s meticulous. It has an elegant feel but a relaxing feel. It’s casual elegance.”
“There’s something about going through the entrance at Miromar Lakes. Seeing that fountain and driving through the gate and seeing the lake, it just relaxes us. The landscaping, it’s meticulous. It has an elegant feel but a relaxing feel. It’s casual elegance.”
Bob & Linda Taylor, Ohio
“We saw Miromar and thought, ‘This place looks off the charts,’” says Dave. “It looks like you’re in the Bahamas. We looked at a model in the morning and bought it that afternoon. We loved the location on the lake and the layout. We have a pontoon and use it all the time. When our extended family visits, the kids go tubing and waterskiing. The first thing I did was join the golf club. Everything about the course is first class.”
“We saw Miromar and thought, ‘This place looks off the charts,’” says Dave. “It looks like you’re in the Bahamas. We looked at a model in the morning and bought it that afternoon. We loved the location on the lake and the layout. We have a pontoon and use it all the time. When our extended family visits, the kids go tubing and waterskiing. The first thing I did was join the golf club. Everything about the course is first class.”
Dave & Teena Wajsgras, Massachusetts
“We have a home in Australia and another at Miromar Lakes. We travel half-way around the world to get here. We have never seen anything like Miromar Lakes anywhere else in the world – not in Germany, France or anywhere in our travels. It is an absolute haven of luxury and beauty.”
“We have a home in Australia and another at Miromar Lakes. We travel half-way around the world to get here. We have never seen anything like Miromar Lakes anywhere else in the world – not in Germany, France or anywhere in our travels. It is an absolute haven of luxury and beauty.”
Rosalie & Gus Rothlin, Australia
“Friends invited us to see them at Miromar Lakes. We drove through the gates at 5 o’clock on a Wednesday, saw the lake, went to Happy Hour and fell in love with the beauty of Miromar. You come down for a weekend and don’t want to leave.”
“Friends invited us to see them at Miromar Lakes. We drove through the gates at 5 o’clock on a Wednesday, saw the lake, went to Happy Hour and fell in love with the beauty of Miromar. You come down for a weekend and don’t want to leave.”
Richard & Cindy Harding, New York
MAKE AN INQUIRY TODAY
Robert Ekdahl
Broker Associate
Meet Robert Ekdahl, Broker Associate at Miromar Lakes Realty
A native Floridian with a passion for real estate, Robert Ekdahl brings a unique blend of entrepreneurial spirit and a customer-centric approach to his role at Miromar Lakes Realty. With over 35 years of experience in marketing and sales, coupled with extensive home building and design expertise, Robert has helped countless clients achieve their real estate goals in Southwest Florida.
Born in Orlando, Florida, Robert moved to Southwest Florida and earned his real estate broker’s license in 2004. His interest in investment real estate led him to pursue a new career path, earning his real estate broker’s license in 2004. He then founded a successful real estate brokerage specializing in vacant land and residential properties. In 2011, he partnered with three others to launch a home-building company, where he spent the next 13 years marketing stunning waterfront homes throughout Southwest Florida.
Robert joined Miromar Lakes Realty to leverage his extensive knowledge and exceptional customer service skills in helping clients find their dream homes within the exclusive Miromar Lakes Beach and Golf Club community. His deep understanding of the local market and commitment to client satisfaction make him an invaluable asset to those seeking a luxury lifestyle in this prestigious community.
Contact Robert Ekdahl today to learn more about how he can help you find your new luxury custom home in Miromar Lakes Beach and Golf Club.
Robert can be reached at 239.908.2314 (Office) • 239.849.0683 (Cell) or Email
[email protected]

MAKE AN INQUIRY TODAY
Meghan Evans
Sales Associate
With over seven years of dedicated experience in the real estate market of Southwest Florida, Meghan has established a reputation for excellence, integrity, and an unwavering commitment to client satisfaction. Specializing in luxury properties, she combines in-depth market knowledge with a keen eye for design, having successfully staged numerous homes to enhance their appeal and achieve optimal sales results.
Meghan’s passion for real estate is matched only by her commitment to providing a personalized and seamless experience for each client. She understands that buying a luxury home is not just a transaction; it’s a lifestyle choice. Whether she is working with buyers seeking their dream home or assisting clients with other real estate needs, she approaches every opportunity with enthusiasm and professionalism.
When not helping clients achieve their real estate goals, she enjoys exploring the stunning landscapes of Southwest Florida, indulging in local cuisine, and staying active in her church and sports. Meghan is a firm believer that although life may not be perfect, your home can be.
For a luxury new construction real estate experience at Miromar Lakes defined by expertise, passion, and exceptional service, connect with Meghan today. Your dream home awaits!
Contact Meghan Evans at 239-908-2316 (office), 941-312-1490 (cell) or
[email protected]

“I love the facilities and the people at Miromar Lakes Golf Club. Having been here for a few years, it feels like home. It is a great atmosphere for me during my time off, and the quality of practice areas and the golf course allow me to prepare well for the LPGA Tour. It is a special place to me.”
“I love the facilities and the people at Miromar Lakes Golf Club. Having been here for a few years, it feels like home. It is a great atmosphere for me during my time off, and the quality of practice areas and the golf course allow me to prepare well for the LPGA Tour. It is a special place to me.”
Professional golfer Brooke Henderson, Ontario, Canada
“It’s the best place in the world. I often sit here and think, ‘Where else would I rather be right now?’ I live here like I’m on vacation.”
“It’s the best place in the world. I often sit here and think, ‘Where else would I rather be right now?’ I live here like I’m on vacation.”
Sandi and Jim Shaffer, Missouri
“We like everything about it. I like how the community is taken care of, I like the opportunity to use our boat in the water, we enjoy the restaurants and entertainment. It’s as well-rounded of a community as anywhere in the country. The people are very nice and everyone gets along and has commonalities."
“We like everything about it. I like how the community is taken care of, I like the opportunity to use our boat in the water, we enjoy the restaurants and entertainment. It’s as well-rounded of a community as anywhere in the country. The people are very nice and everyone gets along and has commonalities."
Thomas & Sandra Cullen, Michigan
“We love the concept of having a home with a swimming pool on the beach and fresh water. That’s not available in very many places. The swimming pool is steps away from the beach. And it’s a real, 700-acre lake, not a pond.”
“We love the concept of having a home with a swimming pool on the beach and fresh water. That’s not available in very many places. The swimming pool is steps away from the beach. And it’s a real, 700-acre lake, not a pond.”
Vance & Judy Sider, Ontario, Canada
“I love the Blue Water Beach Grill, the ambiance, the dancing. I know so many golf people, tennis people. I captain a couple of the teams. It’s the people that really make this come together.”
“I love the Blue Water Beach Grill, the ambiance, the dancing. I know so many golf people, tennis people. I captain a couple of the teams. It’s the people that really make this come together.”
Elaine Dibie, England
“We’re an active and social family and wanted to be on the water. A friend suggested Miromar Lakes. We fell in love with everything about it. Every day is like a party because we know so many people.”
“We’re an active and social family and wanted to be on the water. A friend suggested Miromar Lakes. We fell in love with everything about it. Every day is like a party because we know so many people.”
Karen and Martin Johnson, United Kingdom
“We walked into a home in Miromar Lakes, the doors were open, the breezes hit us; and we saw the white caps on the lake, the white-sand beaches with the palm trees. It was breathtaking, it really was. So we made an offer. Aesthetically, it’s beautiful.”
“We walked into a home in Miromar Lakes, the doors were open, the breezes hit us; and we saw the white caps on the lake, the white-sand beaches with the palm trees. It was breathtaking, it really was. So we made an offer. Aesthetically, it’s beautiful.”
Tony Caputo, Nebraska
